name: Pipe Surfer
description:
This is a PC version of an Android Game I'm working on.

I just wanted to do a quick project I could release relatively fast, since all of my other projects were way too big of a scope, or I'd drop them after a month or two to start a new project, so I started this project.  Something nice and small and easily finish-able in a few months time.

Much of the GUI isn't done, some parts I just did functionality (like in the game over screen) 

Only the Play and Exit buttons work on the main screen.
Animations need to be redone,  Menus need to be made / redone, Game over screen needs to be added, Upgrades, Options, Leaderboards, Ads, making it get more difficult as the game goes on / adding in more obstacles and then fine tuning all the values to make it more fun and then the project is DONE.  I was really hoping I'd have it done by now.

Mouse is set to simulate fingerpress if you want to try the touch controls, but jumping with the right stick has been disabled for this demo.
